scripts.build-site: npm run build-lib && npm run build --workspace=site
scripts.build-site-vercel: cd ./lib && npm run build && cd ../site && npm run build
scripts.build-app: npm run build-lib && npm run build --workspace=app
scripts.build-app-vercel: cd ./lib && npm run build && cd ../app && npm run build
scripts.export-app: cd ./lib && npm run build && cd ../app && IS_STATIC_EXPORT=true npm run build && IS_STATIC_EXPORT=true npm run export
scripts.dev-site: npm run build-lib && npm run dev --workspace=site
scripts.dev-app: npm run build-lib && npm run dev --workspace=app
scripts.extract-strings: npm run -w site lingui:extract && npm run -w app lingui:extract
scripts.compile-strings: npm run extract-strings && npm run -w site lingui:compile && npm run -w app lingui:compile
scripts.extract-strings:dev: npm run -w site lingui:extract:dev && npm run -w app lingui:extract:dev
